ThingDef.label: PnL chain longsword
ThingDef.description: [caution] : Automaton exclusive weapon.\n\nA long sword with a rotating chain saw blade. It works by linking with the automaton and receiving power.

ThingDef.label: PnL warhammer
ThingDef.description: A luxurious war hammer made by PnL industry. There is no special function.

ThingDef.label: PnL twin pistol
ThingDef.description: [caution] : Automaton exclusive weapon.\n\nA dual pistol that fires a lot of bullets at a close range. Used by the Royal Guard's Special Forces Automaton. In conjunction with the automaton, it enables fast reloading and gives the user high melee combat ability.

ThingDef.label: PnL royal rifle (Burst)
ThingDef.description: [caution] : Automaton exclusive weapon.\n\nroyal guard rifle produced by PnL industry. Users can choose between burst shot mode and point shot mode.

li.label: change point shot
li.description: It fires slowly, but has a high accuracy and range.

ThingDef.label: PnL royal rifle (Point)
ThingDef.description: [caution] : Automaton exclusive weapon.\n\nroyal guard rifle produced by PnL industry. Users can choose between bust shot mode and point shot mode.

li.label: change burst shot
li.description: It fires quickly, but has a low accuracy and range.

ThingDef.label: PnL royal heavy slug rifle
ThingDef.description: [caution] : Automaton exclusive weapon.\n\nheavy slug rifle produced by PnL industry. They fire huge bullets, but it have a short range.

ThingDef.label: PnL royal machine gun
ThingDef.description: [caution] : Automaton exclusive weapon.\n\nroyal machine gun produced by PnL industry.

li.label: change mount mode
li.description: Mount machine gun on the ground. It moves very slowly, but it can unleash heavy firepower.

ThingDef.label: PnL royal machine gun (Mounted)
ThingDef.description: [caution] : Automaton exclusive weapon.\n\nroyal machine gun produced by PnL industry.

revertData.label: overheating
revertData.description: If it overheats, will change to cooling mode.

li.label: emergency withdrawal
li.description: Fold the mount and move urgently. Cooling penalty still applies.

ThingDef.label: PnL royal machine gun (overheated)
ThingDef.description: [caution] : Automaton exclusive weapon.\n\nroyal machine gun produced by PnL industry.

revertData.label: Cooling
revertData.description: Performance returns to normal when cooling is complete.

ThingDef.label: PnL multiple launcher (HE)
ThingDef.description: [caution] : Automaton exclusive weapon.\n\nA launcher that can fire a variety of grenades. Users can fire Frag, Incendiary, EMP, Smoke, and Firefoam grenades.

ThingDef.label: PnL multiple launcher (Incendiary)
ThingDef.description: [caution] : Automaton exclusive weapon.\n\nA launcher that can fire a variety of grenades. Users can fire Frag, Incendiary, EMP, Smoke, and Firefoam grenades.

ThingDef.label: PnL multiple launcher (EMP)
ThingDef.description: [caution] : Automaton exclusive weapon.\n\nA launcher that can fire a variety of grenades. Users can fire Frag, Incendiary, EMP, Smoke, and Firefoam grenades.

ThingDef.label: PnL multiple launcher (Smoke)
ThingDef.description: [caution] : Automaton exclusive weapon.\n\nA launcher that can fire a variety of grenades. Users can fire Frag, Incendiary, EMP, Smoke, and Firefoam grenades.

ThingDef.label: PnL multiple launcher (Firefoam)
ThingDef.description: [caution] : Automaton exclusive weapon.\n\nA launcher that can fire a variety of grenades. Users can fire Frag, Incendiary, EMP, Smoke, and Firefoam grenades.
